name: DiceShaker
description:
A simple dice shaking game. Shake the phone or click roll to see what numbers your die will come up as.

You can also randomly change the colour of the die. Why play with plain old red die when you could have bright purple or yellow.

With this two die game you could play Chicago, Pig or many more. It randomly generates two six sided die.

You could just use it to challenge your friends with a game of 'guess how much they will add up too'.
